meanings.sent1: The doctor confirmed that her illness was nonviral.
meanings.sent2: The research focused on nonviral infections.
meanings.sent3: Even the common cold can be nonviral sometimes.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a nonviral outbreak, spreading joy everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The nonviral nature of the bacteria surprised the scientists.

meanings.definition: Not relating to or involving a virus.
meanings.sent1: The nonviral treatment proved effective against bacterial infections.
meanings.sent2: The nonviral symptoms puzzled the medical team.
meanings.sent3: The nonviral discussion at the conference was refreshing.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a nonviral beacon of positivity in the room.
meanings.sent5: The nonviral approach to the problem yielded unexpected results.
